ti

Class HtmlProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ti.HtmlProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentProcessor

    public class HtmlProcessor
extends Object
implements DocumentProcessor
    A processor to extract terms from HTML documents.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HtmlProcessor

        public HtmlProcessor(File pathToStopWords)
              throws IOException
        Creates a new HTML processor.
        Parameters:
        pathToStopWords - the path to the file with stopwords, or null if stopwords are not filtered.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while reading stopwords.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public Tuple<String,String> parse(String html)
        Parse the given document content and extract its title and the main body text.
        Specified by:
        parse in interface DocumentProcessor
        Parameters:
        html - the raw text of the document.
        Returns:
        a Tuple with the document title and the main body text. If either of them can not be extracted, it will return "" in that tuple item.

      • processText

        public ArrayList<String> processText(String text)
        Process the given text (tokenize, normalize, filter stopwords and stemize) and return the list of terms to index.
        Specified by:
        processText in interface DocumentProcessor
        Parameters:
        text - the text to process.
        Returns:
        the list of index terms.

      • isStopWord

        protected boolean isStopWord(String term)
        Checks whether the given term is a stopword.
        Parameters:
        term - the term to check.
        Returns:
